title: Can a 1st semester B.Ed student doing 2 years of a B.Ed course apply for the CTET? - Quora

response.answer_text: No Required eligibility criteria are given below. . CTET Eligibility 2019 is laid down by CBSE both for Paper 1 and Paper 2. The basic requirement is to have passed senior secondary or graduation with minimum 50% aggregate marks and relevant teacher training program. There are two papers of CTET (Paper 1 and Paper 2) having different eligibility criteria.Paper I is to become teacher for classes I to V while Paper II is to become teacher for classes VI to VIII.A person who intends to be a teacher for both levels (classes I to VIII) needs to appear in both the papers.Candidates scoring 60% or more marks in the exam is considered as TET pass.CTET Eligibility: Age & Qualification Applicant must be a citizen of India to be eligible for CTET 2019.There is no age restriction, however, candidate must be minimum 17 years of age.Candidates have to fulfil different eligibility conditions to be a Primary or Elementary Teacher.CTET Eligibility: Educational Qualification CTET Eligibility 2019 requirements are stated below for Primary and Elementary teachers: Primary Teacher (Class 1 to 5) Individuals should have any one of the following qualifications in order to be eligible to appear for Paper 1: Senior Secondary with at least 50% marks and passed or appearing in final year of 2- year Diploma in Elementary Education OR Senior Secondary with at least 45% marks and passed or appearing in final year of 2- year Diploma in Elementary Education in accordance with the NCTE (Recognition Norms and Procedure), Regulations, 2002 OR Senior Secondary with at least 50% marks and passed or appearing in final year of 4- year Bachelor of Elementary Education (B.EI.Ed) OR Senior Secondary with at least 50% marks and passed or appearing in final year of 2- year Diploma in Education (Special Education) OR Graduation with at least 50% marks and Bachelor of Education (B.Ed) . Elementary Teacher (Class 6 to 8) The educational qualification required for appearing in CTET 2019 Paper 2 is given below: Graduation and passed or appearing in final year of 2-year Diploma in Elementary Education OR Graduation with at least 50% marks and passed or appearing in 1-year Bachelor in Education (B.Ed) OR Graduation with at least 45% marks and passed or appearing in 1-year Bachelor in Education (B.Ed) in accordance with the NCTE (Recognition Norms and Procedure) OR Senior Secondary with at least 50% marks and passed or appearing in final year of 4- year Bachelor in Elementary Education (B.EI.Ed) OR Senior Secondary with at least 50% marks and passed or appearing in final year of 4- year B.A/B.Sc.Ed or B.A.Ed/B.Sc.Ed OR Graduation with at least 50% marks and passed or appearing in 1-year B.Ed. (Special Education). Hope!it will help you. Ravindra
